title: AMS drops Hasie “Ideas Machine” NFT to match mud guard, frame protection
content:
Last year’s Hasie & The Robots collection from All Mountain Style showcased artist Johan Johnston’s work on their frame protection decals and mud guard, and now they’re dialing up the color with an animated NFT to match. The project is an extremely limited edition giveaway, with just 10 total NFTs being minted, and only five going

The post AMS drops Hasie “Ideas Machine” NFT to match mud guard, frame protection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
